alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marion County through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salt Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Juniper Springs and Salt Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
